LanguageData.MakeCupBotel.label: Create bottle caps x100
LanguageData.MakeBottlecapGrenades.label: Create a Lid Mine x5
LanguageData.MakeBottlecapGrenades.description: A popular pre-war Vault-Tec lunchbox has become the basis for a deadly mine in the post-apocalyptic Commonwealth. This homemade device will help you deal with any enemy. Can be thrown like a grenade.
LanguageData.BuildFalloutPipeGun.label: Build Pipe shooter
LanguageData.BuildFalloutPipeGun.description: Builds Pipe shooter pistol. Weak and short range, but works.\nCaliber: 9x19mm
LanguageData.BuildVagabondRifle.label: Build Vagabond Rifle
LanguageData.BuildVagabondRifle.description: Builds a Vagabond Rifle for field or urban combat.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildOldRevolver.label: Build Homemade revolver "Scavenger"
LanguageData.BuildOldRevolver.description: Builds revolver "Scavenger". Weak and short range.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
LanguageData.BuildChinesePistol.label: Build Chinese pistol
LanguageData.BuildAN556Order.label: Build AN556 Order
LanguageData.BuildAN556Order.description: The AN556 "Order", a slightly improved version of the AN550,Long Barrel Rifle. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildAssaultCarbine.label: Build Assault Carbine
LanguageData.BuildAssaultCarbine.description: Assault Carbine, The standard assault carbine offers a good balance between damage and accuracy, making it a good choice for a variety of combat situations. Many of the available modifications will make this weapon suitable for automatic fire. And a properly modified assault carbine can become a good sniper carbine with a large magazine and a relatively high rate of fire.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildFatMan.label: Build Fat Man
LanguageData.BuildFatMan.description: Builds the Fat Man.\nCaliber: Nuclear shot
LanguageData.BuildFalloutPlasmaCarbine.label: Build Plasma Carbine
LanguageData.BuildFalloutPlasmaCarbine.description: A short range, lightweight plasma rifle.
LanguageData.BuildFallout_PlasmaPistol.label: Build Plasma Pistol "Ion Fang"
LanguageData.BuildFallout_PlasmaPistol.description: A highly accurate plasma pistol "Ion Fang".
LanguageData.BuildFallout_PlasmaWraith.label: Build Plasma Wraith
LanguageData.BuildFallout_PlasmaWraith.description: A plasma sniper rifle Plasma Wraith, highly accurate but with a low rate of fire.
LanguageData.BuildMinigunPlasma.label: Build Plasma Gatling "Molten Storm"
LanguageData.BuildMinigunPlasma.description: Builds Plasma Gatling "Molten Storm", "When the world is already burned, why stop?"
LanguageData.BuildLaserCarbineRifle.label: Build Carbine"AER-14"
LanguageData.BuildLaserCarbineRifle.description: "A pure slice of Old World technology - smokeless, fail-safe and deadly."
LanguageData.BuildPepperShaker.label: Build Pepper Shaker
LanguageData.BuildPepperShaker.description: Builds a Pepper Shaker, a Pepper Shaker takes one second to spin up before it automatically fires eight shotgun shells. It counts as both a shotgun and a heavy weapon and will benefit from any perk in either weapon class.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildFalloutSyringer.label: Build Syringer
LanguageData.BuildFalloutSyringer.description: Builds Syringer pistol. Weak and short range, but works.\nCaliber: Dart
LanguageData.BuildHellBoss.label: Build Machine Gun "Hell Boss"
LanguageData.BuildHellBoss.description: Machine Gun "Hell Boss" In a world where laws are written with the barrel of a gun and a truce is just a pause to reload, regular machine guns are for those who still believe in negotiations. Hell Boss is not shooting, it is a salvo artillery barrage in a compact format.\nCaliber:.50mm
LanguageData.BuildFlamethrowerLastWarning.label: Build Flamethrower Last Warning
LanguageData.BuildHarpoonGun.label: Build Harpoon Gun
LanguageData.MakeFalloutJet.label: Make Jet x4
LanguageData.MakeFalloutJet4x.label: Make Jet x12
LanguageData.MakeFalloutUltraJet4x.label: Make Ultra Jet x4
LanguageData.MakeFalloutUltraJet12x.label: Make Ultra Jet x12
LanguageData.MakeStimpak12x.label: Make Stimpak x12
LanguageData.MakeStimpakSuper12x.label: Make Stimpak Super x12
LanguageData.MakeMed-x12x.label: Make Med-x x12
LanguageData.MakeMysteriousSerum2x.label: Make Mysterious Serum x2
LanguageData.MakeScorponade2x.label: Make Scorponade x2
